title: 107_s1292
content: Small Business Pollution Prevention Opportunity Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish a dry or wet cleaning equipment credit for any taxable year equivalent to 20 percent of the basis of each qualified dry or wet cleaning property placed in service during the year which is designed primarily to clean textiles if: (1) such equipment does not use any hazardous solvent as the primary process solvent. (2) the original use of such property commences with the taxpayer, and (3) with respect to which depreciation is allowable.
